directions: Combine 5 1/2 cups broth and all remaining ingredients in heavy large saucepan. Simmer until vegetables and lentils are tender, stirring occasionally, about 45 minutes. Thin soup with additional broth if necessary. Season with salt and pepper. Ladle soup into bowls and serve.
ingredients: 5 1/2 cups (or more) canned vegetable or chicken broth
1 pound butternut squash, peeled, seeded, chopped (about 2 cups)
title: Savory Lentil and Squash Soup
